segments.text: Excuse me , I'm looking for a good novel . Can you recommend anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . What kind of novel did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not really sure . I don't like romance novels , but any other genre is okay , as long as the book's good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me see ... This Stephen King novel is a real thriller .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I forgot to mention that I don't like horror much , either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's okay . Well , let me think . How about a mystery novel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... I sometimes like mysteries , but I don't think I'm in the mood for one right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are a number of science fiction and fantasy novels I can recommend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love science fiction and fantasy , but I've been reading a lot of both lately , so I'd prefer to get something else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about a good historical novel ? This one set in medieval France is excellent . The story is exciting and the characterization is very well done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds interesting . Okay , I'll get this one . Thanks for all your help .
segments.speaker: S1
